alert.note: Alert for Central Plaquemines; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans (Louisiana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 08 at 4:19PM CDT by NWS New Orleans
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central St. Bernard, southwestern Orleans, north central Jefferson and northwestern Plaquemines Parishes through 445 PM CDT... At 418 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Terrytown, or near Timberlane. This storm was nearly stationary. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and half inch hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... New Orleans, Chalmette, Harvey, Timberlane, Belle Chasse, Marrero, Gretna, Woodmere, Violet, Terrytown, Meraux, Poydras, Arabi and Estelle. This includes Interstate 10 in Louisiana between mile markers 237 and 241. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.50 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Central Plaquemines; Upper Jefferson; Upper Plaquemines; Upper St. Bernard; Western Orleans
